alert.note: Alert for Genesee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Genesee County through 200 PM EDT... At 112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Blanc, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodrich around 120 PM EDT. Burton around 135 PM EDT. Davison around 140 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Atlas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
